data.name: iOSDevUK
data.description: iOSDevUK started in 2011 as the UK’s first conference for iPhone developers, and has attracted hundreds of developers to Aberystwyth each year since then. It runs from 4pm on Monday until 1pm on Thursday, followed by an optional Hack. It is very much a community event, with a broad range of spea…

relatedRecords.name: Black Hat Europe 2019
relatedRecords.description: Black Hat is the most technical and relevant global information security event series in the world. These high-profile global events and Trainings are driven by the needs of the security community, striving to bring together the best minds in the industry.
